dialogues.sentenceTemplate:
Hey, I’m hosting Thanksgiving dinner tonight… and guess who forgot to make the {dish}? 
Please save me before my family finds out!
Bonjour! I need a {dish} to impress my French teacher, can you make it perfect?
I just broke up with my gym routine... I need some {dish} to heal emotionally.
I’m throwing a game night but forgot the {dish}! Save my reputation!
My doctor said I need to eat more greens... Can you make me a {dish} that doesn’t taste like sadness?
My boss stole my lunch again! Can you make me an emergency {dish} before I lose it?
